description:
The Heijou Institute is a school affiliated with the http://anidb.net/ch95156 [Five Traditions], located in Nara prefecture. Heijou handles http://anidb.net/t7100 [aradama] incidents that take place in the Shikoku region and the southern part of Kansai region. Notably, the school has created many excellent http://anidb.net/t7097 [toji] and http://anidb.net/ch90628 [Shidou Maki], currently the two-time Kenjutsu Tournament champion, graduated from Heijou.
The school is led by President http://anidb.net/ch94796 [Gojou Iroha].
Source: Toji no Miko Wiki
name: Heijou Gakkan
